ID.label: ID

ID.invalidType: The ID field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

FormatID.notProvided: The FormatID field is required but was not provided.
FormatID.invalidType: The FormatID field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

LocationID.invalidType: The LocationID field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

Name.label: Name
Name.notProvided: The Name field is required but was not provided.
Name.invalidType: The Name field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
Name.invalidLength: The Name field is too long. This field must be no more than 255 bytes long.

IMDBLink.invalidLength: The IMDBLink field is too long. This field must be no more than 255 bytes long.

DateInserted.invalidType: The DateInserted field does not contain valid data. This field must be a date value.
